sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Llyfr y Psalmau, wedi eu cyfieithu, a'i cyfansoddi ar fesur cerdd, yn gymraeg. / Drwy waith Edmund Prys Archdiacon Meirionnydd,. Prys, Edmund, 1544-1623.
[8], 65 [i.e. 110], [2] p.
[s.n.], A'i printio yn Llundain. : 1621..
Title printed within ornamental border (McK. & Ferg. 263); head- and tail-pieces, initials. Includes index. Signatures: A-I⁸. Pages numbered on recto only, with numerous errors in paging. Imperfect: cropped, faded, missing and broken type, quire 'I' bound and filmed out of order. Reproduction of original in: National Library of Wales.
=======
